long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the Chrome extension tool to check your SASSA grant status directly in your browser.

With just a single click, you can access real-time updates on the progress of your SASSA SRD grant application and its payment status.

SASSA is a lifeline for millions of South Africans. The financial support through the SASSA social grants is the primary or sole source of income for millions of South Africans. Hence, many people check their grant status frequently, and we made the process even easier.

Disclaimer: When you check your SASSA grant status using this extension, we DON’T store or collect any of the information you enter. The grant status results are fetched directly through the official SASSA API (srd.sassa.gov.za/sc19/status), and we DON’T have access to the data entered. Read more at the Privacy Policy page (https://sassastatus.org/privacy/).
